---
# Content is auto generated
# Manual changes will be overwritten!
title: Page
---
Each page can define a title, an optional icon, and a body
function that renders the content. Pages can also be disabled
to prevent user interaction.

## Constructors
### Page
Page creates a new tab page with the given title and content body.

---
## Methods
| Method | Description |
|--------| ------------|
| `Disabled(disabled bool)` | Disabled marks the page as disabled, making it visible but not selectable. |
| `Icon(ico core.SVG)` | Icon sets the icon displayed next to the page title. |
---
